alert.note: Alert for Marion; Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Walker, east central Marion and southwestern Winston Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1215 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Buttahatchee, or near Lynn, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lynn, Double Springs, Nauvoo, Houston Recreational Area, Camp McDowell, Ashbank, Poplar Springs, Corinth Rec Area, Lake Buttahatchee, Winston Free State Barn, Smith Lake, Natural Bridge, Hullett Branch, Clear Creek, Winston County Airport, Cane Creek, Bull Branch, Rockhouse Creek, Delmar and Lupton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
